question: Which of the following Directive Principles was added via 44<sup>th</sup> amendment act?
option1: To minimise inequalities in income status
option2: To provide free legal aid to poor
option3: To secure the participation of workers in the management of industries
option4: To ensure education for all children until they complete the age of six years
answer: To minimise inequalities in income status
explanation: The 44th Amendment Act of 1978 added one Directive Principle, which requires State to minimise the inequalities in income status
